Text: Great software ... except the idiot that uploaded this included a very nasty virus. Beware!!

The virus was Trojan Horse Generic6.MHU :-(

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS FILE!!!!
My virus checker, Avast, also detected a trojan in this.  Please scan properly before seeding and/or installing.
McAfee didn't show any trojans, but Drweb showed backdoor.poison
this is a trojan dont do it

With the legal penalties for piracy getting stiffer, I think Pirates should consider doing the same with those who break the code. Keep this shit on your own computer. You're not hurting anyone but the amateurs.
yes has trojons 2 clean before oppening,works fine,like it,i used a-squared free,from p-bay
Sadly enough its true, also my scanner recognizes a trojan within the executable file (1 out of 4) Identified as trj/CI.A a class of trojan i presume. So thanks dj, for waisting my time.
